department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Innovative Solutions Canada Program - Testing Stream
description: The canada government is inviting for bid proposal for two (02) contracts with an estimated value of $2,300,000.00 CAN. The work included in the proposals should have value adding features by taking into experimental testing the final development of innovation R & D of pre-commercial products and services according to Technology Readiness Level (TRL) 7 to 9.
full_summary:
===============

## Call for Proposals: Innovative Solutions Canada - Testing Stream

The Canadian government has issued a Call for Proposals (CFP) for the Innovative Solutions Canada - Testing Stream, soliciting innovative solutions to address various Problem Statements. The program aims to acquire, test, and evaluate pre-commercialized goods and services in the late stage development (Technology Readiness Level (TRL) 7 to 9).

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this CFP on behalf of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) and participating departments. The CFP seeks solutions to the Testing Stream Problem Statements and Topics outlined on the ISC website (Open Funding Opportunities page).

## Solicitation Period

The solicitation period is from July 5, 2023 to August 3, 2023. During this period, suppliers can submit their proposals. Please refer to the solicitation documents for information related to Proposal Preparation and Submission Instructions, Evaluation Procedures, Basis of Selection, and other pertinent information.

## Important Details

*   This procurement is set-aside under the Small Business Set-Aside, with a requirement for bidders to be for-profit with 499 or fewer full-time equivalent (FTE) employees.
*   A portion of this procurement is set aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
*   Canadian content is limited to Canadian goods and/or services.
*   The estimated maximum funding available for all Contracts resulting from this CFP is 15 million CAD.

## Procurement Details

*   Estimated maximum funding: 15 million CAD
*   Maximum contract value: 2,300,000 CAD (applicable taxes, shipping, and travel and living expenses are extra)
*   Estimated maximum contract value: 15 million CAD

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please submit written inquiries to the Contracting Authority at: TPSGC.PASICVoletessai-APISCTestingStream.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please note that the deadline for inquiries is five calendar days before the Notice closing date.

Additional details can be found in the solicitation documents, which can be accessed at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6951/solicitation-en578-23is13-b5.pdf

**Important:** This solicitation amendment 001 has inserted subsection 2.1.1, Verification of Bid Completeness,
